name: 2022 12th International Conference on Power and Energy Systems
content: Proceedings Publication: Accepted papers will be published into conference proceedings by IEEE, which is the same with the last years. The proceedings will be submitted and reviewed by the IEEE Xplore and Ei Compendex and Scopus after the conference. ICPES 2022 is listed in IEEE conference calendar: https://conferences.ieee.org/conferences\_events/conferences/conferencedetails/56491
